name: Icee Up
description: I am a young developer learning Godot Engine, this is an ice theme top-down survival game. Select start, then new world to create a world, input the mode and the seed for the world generator (leave seed blank for random seed). It's my first polished game, hope you like it! Please note that the icon on the windows version is incorrect, I'm working on figuring out a solution. I'm still improving the game and I welcome constructive feedback.
